pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Gephi' Network Visualization // Implements key features of 'Gephi' for network visualization, including 'ForceAtlas2' (with LinLog mode), network scaling, and network rotations. It also includes easy network visualization tools such as edge and node color assignment for recreating 'Gephi'-style graphs in R. The package references layout algorithms developed by Jacomy, M., Venturini T., Heymann S., and Bastian M. (2014) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0098679 and Noack, A. (2009) doi:10.48550/arXiv.0807.4052.
